Package org.hyperledger.fabric.gateway.impl.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BlockEventSource
    Allows observing received block events.
    ListenerSession
    An event listening session that can be closed when no longer required to clean up all resources and registrations associated with the listener.
    PeerDisconnectEventSource
    Allows observing peer disconnect events.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockEventSourceFactory
    Factory for creating BlockEventSource instances for channels.
    BlockListenerSession
    Simply adds and removes the listener from a block event source.
    ChannelBlockEventSource
    Used to add and remove block listeners for an underlying Channel.
    CommitListenerSession
    Adds and removes listeners to transactions commit events (from a given block source) and disconnect events (from given peers).
    CompositePeerDisconnectListener
    Attaches a single listener to multiple peer disconnect event sources.
    ContractEventImpl
    Provides a contract event view of a chaincode event and associated data.
    Listeners  
    ListenerSet<T>
    Holds a set of listeners, and allows a function to be applied for each of them to drive notifications.
    OrderedBlockEventSource
    Listens to an existing block event source and ensures that its own listeners receive block events in order and without duplicates.
    PeerDisconnectEventSourceFactory
    Factory for creating PeerDisconnectEventSource instances for a given peer.
    PeerDisconnectInterceptor
    Sets a new disconnect handler for a given peer, which notifies this object's listeners of any disconnect before passing the event to the original handler.
    PeerDisconnectListenerSession
    Simply adds and removes the listener from a peer disconnect event source.
    ReplayListenerSession
    Maintains an isolated client connection for event replay using a listener created by a supplied factory function.
